zoom_input_latency_ms.measurement_method: Time from wheel event to visual zoom change

rebound_detection_accuracy_percent.measurement_method: Rebounds correctly blocked / Total rebounds observed

zoom_drift_at_max.measurement_method: Max observed zoom drift after releasing at 16x

false_positive_rate_percent.measurement_method: Intentional zoom-outs incorrectly blocked / Total intentional zoom-outs

vulnerability_window_coverage_percent.measurement_method: Percentage of 0-150ms window protected by at least one defense layer

protection_layers_active.measurement_method: Number of rebound protection layers implemented and active

cooldown_duration_ms.measurement_method: Duration of zoom-out blocking after reaching max zoom

extended_memory_duration_ms.measurement_method: Duration of direction memory preservation near limits
